title: Three suspects ‘fled the country after BD300,000 investment fraud’
content: THREE fraudsters fled the country after duping 20 victims in Bahrain out of more than BD300,000 in an investment scam, a court heard. Prosecutors say the alleged racket was fronted by a 39-year-old Indian businessman, who ran three mobile phone shops and a cold store .  You Might Like
